name: Barbara Stanwyck Movies Quiz | People Themed | 10 Questions

questions.text: Stanwyck starred with Humphrey Bogart in "The Two Mrs. Carrolls". She played his second wife. What happened to the first wife?
options: She ran off with another man
questions.explanation:
Bogart killed her.

	Bogart is fine as a man on the edge; Stanwyck has a nice turn, too. He tries to kill her, but ...

questions.text: In "Double Indemnity", Stanwyck schemes with Fredd MacMurray to murder Stanwyck's husband. What is the method that the two wish to use in order to collect "double indemnity"?
questions.explanation:
Train accident.

	This is probably one of her best movies. Again, we have a good job by Stanwyck and by her leading man, Fred MacMurray.

questions.text: In "Sorry, Wrong Number", Stanwyck is the target of her husband's murder plot. Who plays the husband?
questions.explanation:
Burt Lancaster.

	This is another very well-known Stanwyck classic. She's a whining, manipulative hypochondriac; poor husband Burt can't take it any longer - heiress or not.

questions.text: Stanwyck starred as which of these characters (in the movie of the same name)?
questions.explanation:
Annie Oakley.

	"Annie Oakley" was an early starring vehicle for Stanwyck.

questions.text: Stanwyck starred with Ronald Reagan in which of these westerns?
questions.explanation:
Cattle Queen of Montana.

	All of these westerns include Stanwyck in the cast. (It's still odd to see a former U.S. president in the movies.)

questions.text: Stanwyck starred in the movie version of "Golden Boy". Who wrote the play on which the movie was based?
questions.explanation:
Clifford Odets.

	Odets also wrote "The Country Girl" (which starred Grace Kelly, Bing Crosby and William Holden). "Golden Boy" was early in Stanwyck's career.

questions.text: Which of these stars did NOT appear in "The Strange Love of Martha Ivers"?
questions.explanation:
Loretta Young.

	This is an interesting tale which features Stanwyck as the pushy and manipulative wife of Kirk Douglas. Van Heflin stars with Lisabeth Scott.

questions.text: Which of these movies co-starred Henry Fonda?
questions.explanation:
The Lady Eve.

	All of the choices were movies with Stanwyck in the cast. Only "Eve" had Fonda, however.

questions.text: "Stella Dallas" was one of Stanwyck's biggest roles. What character did she play?
questions.explanation:
Sacrificing mother.

	This was one of the earliest "tear-jerkers" and was one of Stanwyck's biggest roles.

questions.text: Which of these movies did NOT include Barbara Stanwyck in the cast?
questions.explanation:
Now, Voyager.

	"Voyager" was an early starring role for Bette Davis.
